segments.text: Good afternoon.British Airline.Is there any thing I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I make a reservation for flight FW58 to San Marino ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . When do you want to take the plane ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will that be first class or economy seat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the fare for a first class seat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . I am not a wall streeter.Give me an economy one please .
segments.speaker: S2
